title: Marvel's Avengers is Getting Spider-Man on PlayStation - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.03.20
description:
It's a big news day! Blessing and Tim talk about Marvel's Avengers getting Spider-Man on PlayStation, a new State of Play, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - Housekeeping
It’s a big week here at Kinda Funny Games. In addition to the normal programming…
Thursday: We’re reacting live to PlayStation’s State of Play at 1 pm PT.
Friday: We’re streaming the Avengers Beta 2 pm PT.
Both are happening live on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames and later on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:05 - BREAKING NEWS: Spider-Man is coming to Marvel’s Avengers exclusively on Playstation
00:22:06 - A New PlayStation State of Play is incoming! - PS Blog (Sid Shuman)
00:23:04 - We are all desperately waiting for PS5 news! Why have a State of Play for PS4 games at this point? - Best Friends Q:Branddnh
00:23:20 - Is Sony dropping the ball by not having any big information scheduled, or are they playing it smart by continuing to play chicken with Microsoft and making them go first? - Best Friends Q:anakinjmt
00:31:18 - Sony Confirms You Can't Play PS5 Games with a PS4 Controller - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:40:00 -  HIMS
00:41:00 - Microsoft Confirms Halo Infinite Multiplayer is going Free To Play - Tom Warren @The Verge
00:48:10 - Microsoft Store is getting an overhaul on Xbox - Xbox Wire
00:53:38 - Beyond Good & Evil' is getting a Netflix Adaptation - Borys Kit @ Hollywood Reporter
00:56:20 - One for me: Could we be getting No More Heroes on Switch? - Sal Romano @ Gematsu
00:59:00 - Out today
01:00:08 - Squad Up:Vincent(PS4) - PdxVman
01:00:42 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Imran
